name: Art Test for The Emerald World: Elemental Quest
name_original: Art Test for The Emerald World: Elemental Quest
description:
Submission for Games Made Quick??? Four +

This is the start of an improvement to the other game I have posted on this page.  This version is using RPG Maker MZ and plugins by VisuStella.

This version only has the title screen, one map, menu, battles, no items, and no boss.  Please just use the menu and fight battles to see my art for now.  There are about six different types of enemies. 

I spent most of the week creating new drawings, so that is the focus of my entry.  I'm just getting used to the new features and plugins, so the battles are not that great (just like my older game, don't attack please use the spells, leveling will replenish MP), but this time I drew the enemies.  My other art includes the title screen and character illustrations.  Please feel free to check out my older version to compare the art, take a look at the story, and see a slightly better example of battles.
